name: Warface - Engineer Tournament Pack
detailed_description:
When it comes to real Warface PvP engagements, this is as much as any engineer could wish for. The set consist of a four-piece equipment set and a superb class-specific primary weapon. The gear possesses unique class-relevant perks that will make sure you come out on top in any battle.



Contains the following items:
  • Engineer Open Cup helmet - Decreases flash bang effect by 60%. Increases head protection by 20%. Detects enemy mines.
  • Open Cup shoes - Increases speed while sprinting by 5%. Increases sprint distance by 50%. Delays claymore activation by 3 sec.
  • Open Cup gloves - Increases accuracy by 10% and weapon selection/deselection speed by 20%.
  • Open Cup vest - Increases weapon reloading speed by 10%, provides 40% explosive protection, 20% melee damage protection and 10 pt absorption.
  • AP-84 Custom - The AP-84 Custom is a 4-burst round Polish submachine gun. It features a compact design, very good accuracy, high cyclic rate of fire and high damage. These characteristics provide the best way to make the easiest one burst kill to the upper-body or even hands.



The weapon comes with unique achievements for 10000 and 25000 kills.



All Champion gear is permanent and is allowed in official tournament. This gear will make sure you’re ready to face any foe or obstacle imaginable.

short_description: Contains the full Champion Engineer set as well as the class-specific primary weapon – the AP-84 Custom. This gear is permanent and is a perfect adaptation for any tactical PvP encounter you might end up in. The set also comes with class-specific perks that will make sure you’ll be the one standing victorious after the fight!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2 GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 or AMD ATI Radeon 3650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.6 GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT or better, AMD Radeon 3870 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
